dict.acceptation: 缓和，减轻；（使大便等）通畅；
变得轻松；变得随和；变得和蔼；通便；

sent.orig: A dual-threshold RELAX-CLEAN estimation algorithm is proposed based on the spatial CLEAN algorithm.
sent.trans: 本文提出了一种基于空域CLEAN算法的双门限RELAX-CLEAN源数估计算法。

sent.orig: Breathe out, and suddenly and completely relax the muscle group (do not relax it gradually).
sent.trans: 呼气，突然完全地放松那一个肌肉群（而不是逐渐地放松）。

sent.orig: All right. Mike, you go to the restaurant, you eat, talk, you relax. Make them relax.
sent.trans: 好的，迈克，你去餐厅，你一面吃一面聊，别紧张，也可以使对方轻松下来。

sent.orig: Learn to Relax One of the most valuable skills you can learn is how to relax.
sent.trans: 学会放松你能学会的最宝贵的技能之一是如何放松。
放轻一点好好地享受它。
